mean_en: feeling sad, unhappy, or displeased because something was not as good as expected or because something you hoped for or expected did not happen
word_etyma: dis非，不是+appoint约定+ed形容词后缀 → 失望的
short_phrase: be disappointed in his football team
sentence: He was disappointed that his favorite football team lost.
sentence_trans: 他很失望，因为他最喜欢的足球队输了。
